product_overview: Nim is a modern personal website template designed to showcase professional portfolios, blogs, and interactive content. Built with cutting-edge web technologies, it offers a rich user experience featuring dynamic project galleries, 3D WebGL animations, comprehensive case studies, and a robust blog system, all optimized for performance and accessibility.
core_goals: Provide a visually engaging and interactive professional portfolio presentation.
Support rich, detailed case studies with metrics and visual storytelling.
Offer a seamless blog and content management system using MDX.
Enable dynamic and interactive 3D experiences using WebGL.
Optimize for performance, accessibility, and SEO to reach a broad audience.
Implement a Progressive Web App for offline access and improved user engagement.
Provide robust analytics, security, and quality assurance for reliable delivery.
key_features: Portfolio Homepage showcasing professional profile with AI-enhanced animations.
Dynamic Project Showcase with filtering, detailed case studies, and metric visualizations.
Interactive Case Studies including narratives, stakeholder quotes, and rich media integration.
Detailed About section with career timeline, achievements, and testimonials carousel.
MDX-powered Blog & Content System for technical and thought leadership articles.
3D WebGL Scenes (organic, neural, geometric) for immersive portfolio storytelling.
Sophisticated Animation & Motion System with Framer Motion for micro-interactions and page transitions.
Newsletter Subscription System integrated with backend and analytics.
Full Progressive Web App (PWA) support with service workers and install prompts.
Performance Optimization using lazy loading, web vitals monitoring, and critical CSS.
Comprehensive UI Component Library with accessibility and theming.
SEO optimization including structured data, meta tags, and sitemap generation.
Analytics Integration with Vercel and Google Analytics.
Security features including Content Security Policy and nonce generation.
Automated Test Suite covering unit, integration, and accessibility.
Feature Flag System for controlled feature rollout and A/B testing.
CDN and Asset Optimization to enhance load speed and resource delivery.
Admin and Developer Tools for testing and email management.
Custom Error Handling and user-friendly 404 pages.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Portfolio Homepage to view featured projects and professional profile.
User navigates to Project Showcase to explore filtering options and detailed case studies.
Within case studies, users interact with metrics, quotes, and video content for deeper insights.
Users visit the About section to review career timeline and testimonials.
Users access the Blog to read MDX-formatted technical articles with enhanced styling.
Newsletter sign-up is available throughout the site for user subscriptions.
Interactive 3D scenes enhance engagement on selected pages with optimized performance.
Users receive offline support and app installation prompts via PWA functionality.
Admins use development and test tools for site maintenance and monitoring.
validation_criteria: All pages render correctly and responsively across supported devices and browsers.
MDX blog posts display with correct formatting and custom components.
3D WebGL scenes load efficiently without performance degradation on mobile and desktop.
Animations execute smoothly respecting user preference for reduced motion.
Newsletter subscriptions are correctly recorded and analytics tracked.
PWA passes offline functionality tests and displays install prompts appropriately.
SEO elements like structured data, meta tags, and sitemap are present and valid.
Security policies including CSP headers and nonce usage are enforced without blocking legitimate content.
Feature flags correctly enable or disable features in staged rollouts.
Automated tests pass with coverage for critical components and flows.
Error pages handle unknown routes gracefully with no broken links or UI issues.
CDN integration delivers optimized assets with reduced load times.
Admin tools function as intended for development and testing purposes.
